Original: Assignment. Neither party shall assign their rights or delegate their duties under this Agreement, in whole or in part, without first receiving written consent from the other party hereto, which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld. Notwithstanding the foregoing, Supplier shall be entitled to assign this Agreement in full to GPM Petroleum LP or any wholly-owned subsidiary of GPM Petroleum LP without the prior written consent of Purchaser by providing notice to Purchaser.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: Assignment. Either party may assign their rights or delegate their duties under this Agreement, in whole or in part, without first receiving written consent from the other party hereto, which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld. Notwithstanding the foregoing, Supplier may not assign this Agreement in full to GPM Petroleum LP or any wholly-owned subsidiary of GPM Petroleum LP without the prior written consent of Purchaser by providing notice to Purchaser.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
No Assignment
No party may transfer its rights or delegate its obligations under this Agreement, whether in full or in part, without obtaining prior written approval from the other party, which shall not be unreasonably withheld. However, notwithstanding this restriction, the Supplier is permitted to assign this Agreement in its entirety to GPM Petroleum LP or any of its wholly-owned subsidiaries without requiring prior written consent from the Purchaser, provided that the Purchaser is given formal notice of such assignment.

Original: Assignment. This Agreement, and the Distributor’s rights and obligations hereunder, shall not be assigned in whole or in part by the Distributor without the prior written consent of Supplier. Any attempted assignment or delegation without such consent shall be void and of no effect. The Parties agree that the Supplier shall have the right to assign all of its rights and obligations under this Agreement to an entity not a party to this Distribution Agreement provided that such Entity undertakes the obligations of the Supplier.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: Assignment. This Agreement, and the Distributor’s rights and obligations hereunder, may be assigned in whole or in part by the Distributor without the prior written consent of Supplier. Any attempted assignment or delegation without such consent shall be valid and of effect. The Parties agree that the Supplier shall not have the right to assign all of its rights and obligations under this Agreement to an entity not a party to this Distribution Agreement provided that such Entity undertakes the obligations of the Supplier.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently: No Assignment. The Distributor may not transfer or delegate any of its rights or obligations under this Agreement, whether in whole or in part, without first obtaining the Supplier’s prior written approval. Any attempt to assign or delegate without such consent shall be considered null and unenforceable. However, the Parties acknowledge that the Supplier retains the right to transfer all of its rights and responsibilities under this Agreement to a third party, provided that the transferee assumes all of the Supplier’s contractual obligations.

Original: No Assignment: Neither Party hereto shall have the right to assign or transfer any of its rights hereunder except in connection with a merger of consolidation of such Party or a sale by such Party of all or substantially all of its business and assets provided that the successor entity agrees to assume the assigning Party's obligations pursuant to this Agreement.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: No Assignment: Either Party hereto shall have the right to assign or transfer any of its rights hereunder except in connection with a merger of consolidation of such Party or a sale by such Party of all or substantially all of its business and assets provided that the successor entity agrees to assume the assigning Party's obligations pursuant to this Agreement.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently: Assignment. Neither Party shall assign or transfer any of its rights under this Agreement, except in the event of a merger, consolidation, or the sale of all or a substantial portion of its business and assets. In such cases, the assignment shall only be permitted if the acquiring or successor entity agrees to take on all obligations of the assigning Party under this Agreement.

Original: This Agreement is not assignable by either party hereto, without a written consent from the other party;
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: This Agreement is assignable by either party hereto, without a written consent from the other party;
Same Meaning, Worded Differently: Neither party may transfer or assign this Agreement without first obtaining written approval from the other party.

Original: Assignment, Subletting. Purchaser shall have no right whatsoever to enter into any license, assignment, sublease, pledge or other occupancy agreement with respect to the Sub-Leased Premises or to permit any other person or entity other than Purchaser to occupy the Sub-Leased Premises ASSIGNMENT; SUCCESSORS AND ASSIGNS The Parties may not assign this Agreement or any of their rights or obligations under this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other Parties. This Agreement shall inure to the benefit of and be binding upon the Parties and their respective successors and permitted assigns. Nothing in this Agreement, express or implied, is intended to confer upon any Person other than the Parties, or their respective successors or permitted assigns, any rights or remedies under or by reason of this Agreement. Any attempted assignment in violation of this Section 10 shall be null and void. Any attempted assignment in violation of this Section 10 shall be null and void.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: Assignment, Subletting. Purchaser shall have the right to enter into any license, assignment, sublease, pledge or other occupancy agreement with respect to the Sub-Leased Premises or to permit any other person or entity other than Purchaser to occupy the Sub-Leased Premises ASSIGNMENT; SUCCESSORS AND ASSIGNS The Parties may assign this Agreement or any of their rights or obligations under this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other Parties. This Agreement shall not inure to the benefit of and be binding upon the Parties and their respective successors and permitted assigns. Anything in this Agreement, express or implied, is intended to confer upon any Person other than the Parties, or their respective successors or permitted assigns, any rights or remedies under or by reason of this Agreement. Any attempted assignment in violation of this Section 10 shall be accepted. Any attempted assignment in violation of this Section 10 shall be accepted.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
**Transfer and Subleasing Restrictions**

The Buyer is strictly prohibited from forming any license, transfer, sublease, pledge, or similar occupancy arrangement related to the Sub-Leased Premises. Additionally, the Buyer is not allowed to enable any individual or entity other than themselves to occupy the Sub-Leased Premises.

**Assignment; Successors and Assignees**

Neither party is allowed to transfer this Agreement, nor any of the rights or obligations it encompasses, without obtaining prior written approval from the other parties involved. The terms of this Agreement shall benefit and obligate the Parties as well as their successors and any assigns that are lawfully permitted. No provisions of this Agreement are intended to grant any rights or remedies to any individual or entity that is not a Party or a permitted successor or assignee. Any attempt to assign this Agreement that contravenes this section shall be considered invalid and have no legal effect.

Original: Consultant may not assign or delegate this Agreement or any of Consultant’s rights or obligations under this Agreement without the prior written consent of the Company. Any attempted assignment or delegation without the necessary consent shall be void.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: Consultant may assign or delegate this Agreement or any of Consultant’s rights or obligations under this Agreement without the prior written consent of the Company. Any attempted assignment or delegation without the necessary consent shall be allowed.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently: Without prior written approval from the Company, the Consultant is prohibited from assigning or delegating this Agreement or any associated rights or duties. Any attempt to assign or delegate without obtaining such consent will be considered invalid.

Original: Either Party may assign this Agreement or its rights or interests hereunder in whole or in part, or delegate its obligations hereunder in whole or in part, with the prior written consent of the other Party, which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: Neither Party may assign this Agreement or its rights or interests hereunder in whole or in part, or delegate its obligations hereunder in whole or in part, with the prior written consent of the other Party, which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
Assignment and Delegation

With the other Party's prior written approval, which must not be withheld unreasonably, each Party retains the right to transfer this Agreement, including any of its rights or interests, in full or partially, or to delegate any obligations, whether fully or in part.

Original: Assignment.  This Agreement may not be assigned or otherwise transferred by either Party without the prior written consent of the other Party; provided, however, that (a) LipoScience may, without such consent from Agilent, assign its rights together with its obligations under this Agreement to any entity acquiring substantially all of its assets or stock, or its business relating to the Vantera Analyzer, or with which it may merge and (b) Agilent may, without consent from LipoScience, assign its rights together with its obligations under this Agreement to any entity acquiring substantially all the assets of its NMR business, or with which it may merge; provided, however, that such Party’s rights and obligations under this Agreement shall be assumed by its successor in interest in any such transaction. Any purported assignment in violation of the preceding sentence shall be void. Any permitted assignee shall assume all obligations of its assignor under this Agreement.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: Assignment.  This Agreement may be assigned or otherwise transferred by either Party without the prior written consent of the other Party; provided, however, that (a) LipoScience may not, without such consent from Agilent, assign its rights together with its obligations under this Agreement to any entity acquiring substantially all of its assets or stock, or its business relating to the Vantera Analyzer, or with which it may merge and (b) Agilent may not, without consent from LipoScience, assign its rights together with its obligations under this Agreement to any entity acquiring substantially all the assets of its NMR business, or with which it may merge; provided, however, that such Party’s rights and obligations under this Agreement shall not be assumed by its successor in interest in any such transaction. Any purported assignment in violation of the preceding sentence shall be allowed. Any permitted assignee shall not assume all obligations of its assignor under this Agreement.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
Transfer of Rights and Duties

Neither Party is allowed to transfer or assign this Agreement without obtaining prior written approval from the other Party. However, exceptions to this requirement permit LipoScience to assign its rights and duties under this Agreement to a successor, should it merge or sell nearly all its assets, stock, or operations related to the Vantera Analyzer, without needing Agilent’s consent. Similarly, Agilent may transfer its rights and obligations under this Agreement to another entity acquiring almost all assets related to its NMR business or merging with it, without requiring consent from LipoScience. It is crucial that in any such transfer, the new entity assumes the obligations and rights described in this Agreement. Any assignment attempted in breach of this provision is considered void. Additionally, any party that is allowed to take over this Agreement must fulfill all responsibilities of the original Party.

Original: This Agreement, and any rights or duties under it may not be assigned or delegated by Buyer; any attempted assignment or delegation by Buyer will be void. (E) In the event of a sale or transfer of all or substantially all ofBuyer’s equity shares or assets, or a controlling interest in either, by merger, acquisition, exchange, joint venture, or other similar transaction, Seller may, at its sole option, immediately terminate this Agreement.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: This Agreement, and any rights or duties under it may be assigned or delegated by Buyer; any attempted assignment or delegation by Buyer will be permitted. (E) In the event of a sale or transfer of all or substantially all ofBuyer’s equity shares or assets, or a controlling interest in either, by merger, acquisition, exchange, joint venture, or other similar transaction, Seller may not, at its sole option, immediately terminate this Agreement.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
Assignment and Delegation Restrictions

The Buyer is prohibited from assigning or delegating any rights or obligations under this Agreement. Any effort by the Buyer to assign or delegate will be considered invalid. (E) Should there be a sale or transfer involving the majority or entirety of the Buyer’s equity shares, assets, or a controlling interest—whether through merger, acquisition, exchange, joint venture, or other comparable transactions—the Seller retains the exclusive right to terminate this Agreement without delay.

Original: Assignment. You will not assign this Agreement, or delegate or sublicense any of your rights under this Agreement, without our prior written consent. Any assignment or transfer in violation of this Section 13.8 will be void.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: Assignment. You may assign this Agreement, or delegate or sublicense any of your rights under this Agreement, without our prior written consent. Any assignment or transfer in violation of this Section 13.8 will be allowed.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
Transfer of Rights  
You are prohibited from transferring this Agreement or any rights under it, whether through assignment, delegation, or sublicensing, without obtaining our prior written consent. Any such transfer or assignment that contravenes this Section 13.8 shall be deemed null and void.

Original: Successors; Binding Effect. This Agreement shall be binding on and inure to the benefit of Merrill Lynch’s successors, by merger, consolidation or otherwise, and assigns, and Merrill Lynch may transfer your Account to any such successors or assigns. This Agreement and the obligations of Customer hereunder may not be assigned or delegated by Customer without the -9-prior written consent of Merrill Lynch, and any purported assignment or delegation without such consent shall be void.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: Successors; Binding Effect. This Agreement shall not be binding on and inure to the benefit of Merrill Lynch’s successors, by merger, consolidation or otherwise, and assigns, and Merrill Lynch may not transfer your Account to any such successors or assigns. This Agreement and the obligations of Customer hereunder may be assigned or delegated by Customer without the -9-prior written consent of Merrill Lynch, and any purported assignment or delegation without such consent shall be allowed.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
Successors and Binding Obligations

This Agreement is legally binding upon, and provides benefits to, any successors or assigns of Merrill Lynch, whether through merger, consolidation, or other means. Merrill Lynch reserves the right to transfer your Account to any such successor or assign. Conversely, the Customer is prohibited from assigning or delegating this Agreement and the accompanying obligations without obtaining prior written approval from Merrill Lynch. Any attempt by the Customer to assign or delegate without such consent will be considered invalid.

Original: Neither of us may assign this Agreement, in whole or in part, without the prior written consent of the other. Any attempt to do so is void. Neither of us will unreasonably withhold such consent. The assignment of this Agreement, in whole or in part, within the Enterprise of which either of us is a part or to a successor organization by merger or acquisition does not require the consent of the other. IBM is also permitted to assign its rights to payments under this Agreement without obtaining your consent. It is not considered an assignment for IBM to divest a portion of its business in a manner that similarly affects all of its customers.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: Either of us may assign this Agreement, in whole or in part, without the prior written consent of the other. Any attempt to do so is permitted. Either of us may unreasonably withhold such consent. The assignment of this Agreement, in whole or in part, within the Enterprise of which either of us is a part or to a successor organization by merger or acquisition requires the consent of the other. IBM is also not permitted to assign its rights to payments under this Agreement without obtaining your consent. It is considered an assignment for IBM to divest a portion of its business in a manner that similarly affects all of its customers.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently: Neither party is allowed to transfer this Agreement, either entirely or partially, unless prior written approval is obtained from the other party. Any attempt to transfer without such approval is invalid. Furthermore, neither party shall unjustly refuse such approval. However, transferring this Agreement, wholly or partly, within the respective Enterprise of either party or to an entity succeeding either party via merger or acquisition does not necessitate consent from the other party. Additionally, IBM may transfer its rights to receive payments under this Agreement without needing your approval. Divesting a part of its business in a manner that uniformly impacts all its customers will also not be regarded as an assignment by IBM.

Original: Customer may not assign this Agreement without C&W USA's prior written consent.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: Customer may assign this Agreement without C&W USA's prior written consent.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
Assignment Restrictions

The Customer shall not transfer or delegate this Agreement without first obtaining written approval from C&W USA.

Original: Assignment. This Agreement may be assigned in whole or in part upon receipt of the written consent of the other parties hereto.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: Assignment. This Agreement may not be assigned in whole or in part upon receipt of the written consent of the other parties hereto.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently: Transfer of Agreement Rights. One party to this Agreement may transfer their rights or obligations, either entirely or partially, but only after obtaining written approval from the other parties involved.

Original: Assignment. This Agreement may be assigned to an affiliate of the Manager or the Distributor, as that term is defined in the Securities Act (British Columbia), but otherwise this Agreement shall not be assignable by either party hereto, without the express prior written consent of the other.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: Assignment. This Agreement may not be assigned to an affiliate of the Manager or the Distributor, as that term is defined in the Securities Act (British Columbia), but otherwise this Agreement shall be assignable by either party hereto, without the express prior written consent of the other.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
Transfer of Rights

The rights and obligations under this Agreement can be transferred to an affiliate of either the Manager or the Distributor, according to the definition within the Securities Act (British Columbia). Outside of this provision, neither party may transfer their interests in the Agreement without obtaining explicit written consent from the other party beforehand.

Original: The Sub-Manager shall not directly transfer all or any portion of its right to receive the Sub-Manager Base Management Fee, the Sub-Manager Termination Fee or any of the amounts payable to the Sub-Manager under this Agreement (but excluding proceeds thereof) to any other Person, without the prior written consent of the Manager (which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld, delayed or conditioned).  Assignment. Except as set forth in this Section 12, this Agreement shall not be assigned by any party hereto without the prior written consent of the other parties. (a) The Manager may not assign any of its rights and obligations under this Agreement, except that the Manager may assign, in their entirety, its rights and obligations under this Agreement to any third party upon the assignment of its rights and obligations under the Management Agreement to such third party; provided that both the assignee agrees in writing to assume all obligations hereunder and the Manager shall continue to remain liable for its obligations to the Sub-Manager hereunder.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: The Sub-Manager may directly transfer all or any portion of its right to receive the Sub-Manager Base Management Fee, the Sub-Manager Termination Fee or any of the amounts payable to the Sub-Manager under this Agreement (but excluding proceeds thereof) to any other Person, without the prior written consent of the Manager (which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld, delayed or conditioned).  Assignment. Except as set forth in this Section 12, this Agreement may be assigned by any party hereto without the prior written consent of the other parties. (a) The Manager may assign any of its rights and obligations under this Agreement, except that the Manager may not assign, in their entirety, its rights and obligations under this Agreement to any third party upon the assignment of its rights and obligations under the Management Agreement to such third party; provided that both the assignee agrees in writing to assume all obligations hereunder and the Manager shall continue to remain liable for its obligations to the Sub-Manager hereunder.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently: The Sub-Manager is prohibited from transferring, in whole or in part, its entitlement to the Sub-Manager Base Management Fee, the Sub-Manager Termination Fee, or any sums owed under this Agreement (excluding the proceeds thereof) to another party, without first obtaining written permission from the Manager. This permission shall not be unreasonably withheld, delayed, or made conditional. Assignment. As outlined in Section 12, no party to this Agreement may assign it without first receiving written approval from the other parties involved. (a) The Manager is restricted from transferring its rights and duties under this Agreement. However, the Manager is permitted to delegate all its rights and duties under this Agreement to a third party, provided the rights and duties from the Management Agreement are also transferred to that third party, the third party consents in writing to fulfill all the associated obligations, and the Manager remains liable for its duties to the Sub-Manager as set forth in this Agreement.

Original: The rights and obligations arising hereunder with respect to each of the parties hereto shall be binding upon and enure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their respective successors and assigns, but neither this Agreement nor any interest herein shall be assigned by any of the parties without the written consent of each of the other parties.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: The rights and obligations arising hereunder with respect to each of the parties hereto shall be binding upon and enure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their respective successors and assigns, and either this Agreement or any interest herein may be assigned by any of the parties without the written consent of each of the other parties.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently: The rights and responsibilities outlined in this agreement shall be binding on and benefit both parties and their respective successors and assigns. However, no party may transfer this agreement or any interest in it without obtaining written approval from each of the other parties.

Original: This Agreement may be assigned to an Affiliate of the Distributor, as that term is defined in the Act, but otherwise shall not be assignable by any party without the prior written consent of the other parties.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: This Agreement may not be assigned to an Affiliate of the Distributor, as that term is defined in the Act, but otherwise shall be assignable by any party without the prior written consent of the other parties.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
Assignment of Agreement

The rights and obligations under this Agreement can be transferred to an Affiliate of the Distributor, in accordance with the definition provided in the Act. In any other circumstances, no party is permitted to assign this Agreement without first obtaining written consent from the other parties involved.

Original: Except to the extent permitted by Section 17.2, neither party may take any of the following actions (collectively referred to herein as an "Assignment"): (i) assign a material part of its rights or obligations under this Agreement, (ii) subcontract, sublicense or otherwise delegate a material part of its rights or obligations under this Agreement, or (iii) designate another person to perform all or a material part of its obligations under this Agreement (except in the ordinary course of business), without the prior written consent of the other party, except to a successor of the entire business of the Distributor, by merger, amalgamation or otherwise.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: Except to the extent restricted by Section 17.2, either party may take any of the following actions (collectively referred to herein as an "Assignment"): (i) assign a material part of its rights or obligations under this Agreement, (ii) subcontract, sublicense or otherwise delegate a material part of its rights or obligations under this Agreement, or (iii) designate another person to perform all or a material part of its obligations under this Agreement (except in the ordinary course of business), without the prior written consent of the other party, except to a successor of the entire business of the Distributor, by merger, amalgamation or otherwise.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
Restrictions on Assignments

Unless allowed under Section 17.2, neither party is permitted to pursue any of the following actions (collectively termed as an "Assignment") without obtaining prior written consent from the other party: (i) transferring a significant portion of its rights or obligations stated in this Agreement, (ii) subcontracting, sublicensing, or otherwise delegating a substantial portion of its responsibilities or rights under this Agreement, or (iii) appointing another individual to fulfill all or a significant portion of its obligations as outlined in this Agreement (except as typically occurs in the ordinary course of business), unless it is to a successor of the Distributor's entire business, achieved through merger, amalgamation, or other means.

Original: Assignment. (a) Except as provided in Section 10.1(b) below, none of the Parties may assign, sublicense, transfer or otherwise dispose of any rights or sub-contract or transfer or otherwise dispose of any obligations under this Agreement, other than in connection with the sale or transfer of all or substantially all the assets of the assigning Party, except with the prior written approval of Unisource and ISC, which approval shall not be unreasonably withheld or delayed.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: Assignment. (a) Except as restricted in Section 10.1(b) below, any of the Parties may assign, sublicense, transfer or otherwise dispose of any rights or sub-contract or transfer or otherwise dispose of any obligations under this Agreement, other than in connection with the sale or transfer of all or substantially all the assets of the assigning Party, except with the prior written approval of Unisource and ISC, which approval shall not be unreasonably withheld or delayed.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
Transfer of Rights and Obligations  

(a) Unless stated otherwise in Section 10.1(b) below, no Party is permitted to assign, sublicense, transfer, or otherwise divest itself of rights, nor sub-contract or transfer its obligations under this Agreement, except in the case of a transfer or sale involving all or nearly all of its assets. Such actions require prior written consent from Unisource and ISC, which shall not be withheld or delayed unreasonably.
